id.description: The unique ID of the user.

is_email_verified.description: Boolean indicating whether the email is verified.

phone.description: 10 digit phone number without country code.

country_code.description:
Two-letter code begin with a plus sign prefix that identifies different countries. By default it will be +91 if not provided.
Use this key along with phone. Not necessary for email.

is_phone_verified.description: Boolean indicating whether the phone is verified.

profile_image_url.description: URL to the user's profile image.

is_anonymous.description: Indicates whether the user is anonymous.

is_logged_in.description: Indicates whether the user is currently logged in.

notification_preferences.description: User's notification preferences are categorized by transactional, promotional, and newsletter types.

created_at.description: Timestamps indicate when the user's account was created.

modified_at.description: Timestamps indicating when the user account was last modified.

externalDocs.description: API reference for the User schema
